title: U.S. Announces Its Young World Cup Roster
description: Coach Gregg Berhalter named the 26-player roster for the U.S. men’s national soccer team’s long-anticipated return to the World Cup after missing out in 2018.
dc:creator: Andrew Keh
category: United States Men's National Soccer Team
media:description: The core of Gregg Berhalter’s U.S. team has been set for months, but his final decisions included a few surprises.
